attributes.action: ensure that the BBC does not compromise its integrity and reputation by taking advertisements on its news website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition wants to make sure that the BBC, one of the United Kingdom's most valuable and cherished gifts to the rest of the world, does not agree to accept advertisements on its news website. It is born of a conviction that the BBC's editorial independence must at all costs be safeguarded and would be fatally compromised by the acceptance of any advertisements.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that the BBC does not compromise its integrity and reputation by taking advertisements on its news website."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
